field.label: Title
field.hint: Enter the name of the file.
field.required: You must enter a name for this file

field.label: Description
field.hint: Enter a description for the file

field.label: Author
field.hint: Enter the author's name (Family name, Given names).

field.label: Title
field.hint: Enter the main title of the item.
field.required: You must enter a main title for this item.

field.label: Other Titles
field.hint: If the item has any alternative titles, please enter them here.

field.label: Date of Issue
field.hint: Please give the date of previous publication or public distribution. You can leave out the day and/or month if they aren't applicable.
field.required: You must enter at least the year.

field.label: Publisher
field.hint: Enter the name of the publisher of the previously issued instance of this item.

field.label: Citation
field.hint: Enter the standard citation for the previously issued instance of this item.

field.label: Series/Report No.
field.hint: Enter the series and number assigned to this item by your community.

field.label: Identifiers
field.hint: If the item has any identification numbers or codes associated with it, please enter the types and the actual numbers or codes.

field.label: Type
field.hint: Select the type of content of the item.
field.required: You must choose at least one type.

field.label: Language
field.hint: Select the language of the main content of the item. If the language does not appear in the list, please select 'Other'. If the content does not really have a language (for example, if it is a dataset or an image) please select 'N/A'.

field.label: Subject Keywords
field.hint: Enter appropriate subject keywords or phrases.

field.label: Abstract
field.hint: Enter the abstract of the item.

field.label: Sponsors
field.hint: Enter the names of any sponsors and/or funding codes in the box.

field.label: Description
field.hint: Enter any other description or comments in this box.

field.label: Title of document
field.hint: Enter the main title of the item.

field.label: Proyecto
field.hint: Nombre del proyecto utilizado dentro de CIMMYT para identificar el plano p. ej. "Ampliación y remodelación de Centro Internacional de Mejoramiento de Maíz y Trigo CIMMYT"

field.label: Ubicación
field.hint: Lugar donde fue enviado p. ej. "CIMMYT: Km. 45 Carretera México-Veracruz. El Batán Texcoco. C.P.56130 Estado de México"

field.label: Título
field.hint: Nombre o titulo que esta dentro del plano p. ej. "Alumbrado planta baja dormitorio AS-Built"
field.required: Debes escribir el nombre o título que esta dentro del plano.

field.label: Empresa
field.hint: Despacho responsable de realizar la obra.

field.label: Aprobó
field.hint: Nombre del responsable en CIMMYT que aprobó el proyecto o el plano para la realización de la obra.

field.label: Escala
field.hint: Escala mostrada dentro del plano p. ej. "0.09375"

field.label: Fecha
field.hint: Fecha marcada dentro del plano.

field.label: Número de Plano
field.hint: Información relacionada al número de plano o planos que se ubican dentro del registro p. ej. "IEA-01"

field.label: Plano de referencia
field.hint: P. ej. "CON-01"

field.label: Palabras Clave
field.hint: Información que puede ayudar a recuperar los planos p. ej. "Mapa hidráulico"

field.label: Idioma
field.hint: Se sugiere utilizar este metadato por el tipo de información que se muestra en los planos y la cual se utilizara para integrarla dentro de los registros.

field.label: Title
field.hint: Document title.
field.required: You must enter a main title.

field.label: Abstract or description
field.hint: Information that can describe the content on document.

field.label: Keywords
field.hint: Keywords relate to documents or topic work in Grin Global System

field.label: Notes
field.hint: The relevant or complementary information related to the contents document.

field.label: Alternative title
field.hint: You can add another title to identify this document.

field.label: Contributor
field.hint: People, institution or representative contributes the content to this document.

field.label: Date
field.hint: Date on which this document was published
field.required: You must enter at least the year.

field.label: Language
field.hint: Language related to content this document.

field.label: Version
field.required: Select appropriate Publication version.

field.label: Album title
field.required: Title assigned to the album.

field.label: Alternative title
field.hint: Alternative title of the album e.g. the title in other language.

field.label: Photographer
field.hint: Name of the photographer who took the photos in the album.

field.label: Place of publication
field.hint: Country in which the photograph was taken.

field.label: Historical Coverage
field.hint: Add information concerning a specific era or historical event related to the resource, e.g. Independence, World War I.

field.label: Publication date
field.hint: Year in which the photograph was taken.
field.required: You must enter at least the year.

field.label: Description or Resumen
field.hint: Please provide a brief description of the photograph that may be helpful in its search and retrieving.

field.label: Physical description
field.hint: Add information related to the physical format of the photograph, e.g., negative

field.label: Format size
field.hint: Add information related to the size of the physical format of the photograph, e.g., 4"x6"

field.label: Agrovoc
field.hint: Add the appropriate AGROVOC term which best describes the photograph.

field.label: Keywords
field.hint: Add other terms that might be useful when searching for this photograph.

field.label: Personal
field.hint: Add information about the people who appear in the photograph.

field.label: Format
field.hint: Please select the format of the photograph e.g. PNG, GIF.

field.label: Audience
field.hint: Please select one or more intended audiences for the resource, e.g. General public, Researchers, Students.
field.required: Select appropriate audience.

field.label: Publisher
field.hint: Please select the institution or institutions that provided funding to publish the photograph.

field.label: Relation
field.hint: Handle or other identifier, where another version or other element that is related to this photograph is located.

field.label: Specific Location Coverage
field.hint: Please add information related to specific places, such as localities, cities, towns, etc. in which the photograph was taken.

field.label: Video title
field.required: Title assigned to the video.

field.label: Alternative title
field.hint: Alternative title of the video e.g. the title in other language.

field.label: Director
field.hint: Name of the director of the video.

field.label: Place of publication
field.hint: Country in which the video was recorded.

field.label: Historical Coverage
field.hint: Add information concerning a specific era or historical event related to the resource, e.g. Independence, World War I.

field.label: Publication date
field.hint: Year in which the video was taken.
field.required: You must enter at least the year.

field.label: Description or Resumen
field.hint: Please provide a brief description of the video that may be helpful in its search and retrieving.

field.label: Physical description
field.hint: Add information related to the physical format of the photograph, e.g., negative

field.label: Agrovoc
field.hint: Add the appropriate AGROVOC term which best describes the video.

field.label: Keywords
field.hint: Add other terms that might be useful when searching for this video.

field.label: Personal
field.hint: Add information about the people who appear in the video.

field.label: Format
field.hint: Please select the format of the video, e.g. MP4, MOV.
